channel.title: Slate's Negotiation Academy
channel.description: A series of short podcasts that reveal the secrets of everyday haggling, whether you’re negotiating in the board room or your child’s bedroom. Part of the Panoply Network.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A series of short podcasts that reveal the secrets of everyday haggling, whether you’re negotiating in the board room or your child’s bedroom.
channel.itunes:author: Slate Magazine/Panoply
